conversations.body_text: I haven’t had any more information about my order either and cant receive any tracking information
Hi jasmine sorrell,  Please provide the order date, contact name, country, and order amount, and I will help you find the order number.

20th of December I ordered it and it should be under my name which is
Jasmine sorrell . Country is United Kingdom address it should be delivered
to is 34 lovetofts drive Ip15jz

On Wed, 31 Dec 2025 at 02:51, service@simsonn.com

The order amount was £120 i think

wrote:

Yes, I have received it.
